snippet: A radio talk-show host has stirred up civil rights activists by urging biblical punishment -- which he says means death -- for gay men and lesbians.    The talk-show host, Rich Agozino, whose ''Crosstalk'' is broadcast on KBRT-AM, urged callers on...
lead_paragraph: A radio talk-show host has stirred up civil rights activists by urging biblical punishment -- which he says means death -- for gay men and lesbians. The talk-show host, Rich Agozino, whose ''Crosstalk'' is broadcast on KBRT-AM, urged callers on Aug. 29 to write legislators asking for laws that fit his view of God's punishment for homosexuals.
abstract: Radio talk-show host Rich Agozino has stirred up civil rights activists in California by urging biblical punishment--which he says means death--for gay men and lesbians (S)

headline.main: Anti-Gay Talk Show Is Drawing Criticism
